channel.title: Shawn Hornbeck
channel.description:
ST. LOUIS - Shawn Hornbeck said he couldn't bear to watch news reports about his lengthy disappearance and kept praying he would be reunited with his family, according to interviews broadcast Thursday on "The Oprah Winfrey Show."
Neighbors said Shawn was not physically held captive. He was living with Devlin on the ground floor of a modest apartment complex next to a railroad track. Residents say they often spotted Shawn out and about, visiting friends on his bicycle or playing video games with the apartment door open.

item.title: Shawn Hornbeck
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

PualT, if you can remember the Elizabeth Smart story, it is the same thing basically.

She was 6 miles away from her house, often left alone in an unlocked house. She would see her friends (without talking to them) and everything. But yet she was held “captive” for like a year.

Stupid people.

Read full topic

item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

My mum watches this gay thing all day on fox news.

She told me that devlin put a gun to shawn’s head and brainwashed him into thinking that his family hates him. And that if he goes and tries to find them, he will kill shawn and his family.

his friends didnt realise he was supposed to be kidnapped?

IMO something much more mysterious is going on here.

Something as mysterious as a teenager playing video games all day instead of going to school?

item.title: Shawn Hornbeck
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Not to mention, Paul, I'm sure the rapist slept and that kitchen knife would've been plenty capable of taking that "fat fucker" down.

No, but he was allowed to sleep over friends houses. He could have snuck back in, Splinter Cell style, and killed the guy. But that’s all speculation, he could easily have escaped or contacted the police any number of times.

Read full topic

item.title: Shawn Hornbeck
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Look, i agree with you in a way, but the kid had psycological problems, he probably felt emotionally attached.

Yeah, somebody waves a gun in your face and makes you suck his dick, you get scared and horrified, shocked and confused. But life fucking sucks, shit happens. He’s being displayed on TV as a hero, for doing jack shit. In fact, if what your saying is true, he did less than nothing, he gave in and gave up. He could’ve tried to escape, he didn’t. He had access to a bike, alot of free time, and plenty of videogames for training. He just had to get practice on splinter cell, and he could have taken that fat fucker out in the dead of night with a butcher knife.

Read full topic

item.title: Shawn Hornbeck
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

PaulT:

[quote]Were they that bad that he’d rather be raped then live with them, or as you guys say is he just a fucking retard?

It’s a tough question, made even more difficult by the fact that the family rushed to appear on Oprah directly after the incident, and that this kid is made to be some kind of tragic hero for the American public to fawn at. Any mention of his “Stockholm Syndrome” on the news is limited to Bill O’Reilly raising his eyebrows.

the kid was probably insecure, he probably got threatened by devlin if he didnt come back.

So he rode his bike to friends houses, and then made sure he always came back at the appointed time. He never mentioned to a friends parent that he was being assraped by his mysterious parent, who didn’t send him to school. He never biked a few miles to a police station. If you have a bike and a few hours, don’t tell me you couldn’t find a phone or a policeman. Fuck, the police seem to always find me when I’m on a bike, so they can ask me where I stole it. He never used a payphone to call 9/11. Shit man, he could’ve grabbed a knife from the kitchen and headed into the woods.[/quote]

Look, i agree with you in a way, but the kid had psycological problems, he probably felt emotionally attached.

Read full topic

He never used a payphone to call 9/11. Shit man, he could’ve grabbed a knife from the kitchen and headed into the woods.

It’s called brain washing through peer pressure and self degrading.

item.title: Shawn Hornbeck
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

But his parents believe he was repeatedly sexually assaulted by the alleged pedophile who spirited him away in 2002.

Hornbeck, who was not allowed to go to school during the time he was kept hostage in the town of Kirkwood, would only say that he whiled away the hours sleeping, playing video games and riding his bike, as his alleged kidnapper worked two jobs.

Hmm, he whiled away the hours between sexual abuse riding his bike, often to his friends houses. What a fucking idiot.

Read full topic
